function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of false information about COVID-19 prevention measures","Impact":"Tragic consequences, including death and difficulty in containing outbreaks","Mitigation":"Rapid and accurate communication of information, fact-checking, public education","Technologies":"Social media monitoring tools, fact-checking algorithms, public health communication platforms","People":"General public, vulnerable populations, healthcare workers","Owner":"Public health authorities, media organizations"},{"Description":"Misleading articles on COVID-19 prevention measures","Impact":"Confusion and misinformation about effective prevention methods","Mitigation":"Fact-checking, clear communication of guidelines, public education","Technologies":"Fact-checking algorithms, public health communication platforms","People":"General public, readers and viewers of media content","Owner":"Media organizations, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Resistance to wearing masks due to misinformation","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and transmission of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Clear communication of benefits of masks, fact-checking misleading information, public education","Technologies":"Public health communication platforms, social media monitoring tools, fact-checking algorithms","People":"General public, communities, individuals in close proximity","Owner":"Public health authorities, community leaders"}]}
